name: Verify Door Button Audio Feedback Consistency
description: Validates that the locked door button provides consistent audio feedback when attempting invalid interactions.
testObjective: Ensure audio feedback is consistent across all non-interactable objects including the door button.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in the ship room
Player has not yet activated power button

steps.action: Press [E] on non-interactable objects in the room
steps.expected: Disabled sound effect plays for invalid interactions

steps.action: Press [E] specifically on the locked door button
steps.expected: Disabled sound effect plays (same as other non-interactable objects)
No visual or audio effect (button is disabled)

postconditions: Audio feedback is consistent across all non-interactable objects
